thread.section_title: Shichahai Shadow Art Performance Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice authentic place inside a hutong
thread.title_full: Nice authentic place inside a hutong - Review of Shichahai Shadow Art Performance Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: ronenin
title: Nice authentic place inside a hutong
text:
Nice authentic place in the hurt of a hutong (old Peking quarter).
We designed, well maintained and the service is good and professional.
Worth the money and bring a local experience.
Rooms are small but well maintain and cleaned.
